page.title: 15BALLOCH PLAYGROUP
page.content: The playgroup is held in the community hall,Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday, 10am_12noon.Children attending must be between the ages of three and five years. At present the playgroup has a waiting list.This applies to the session starting in August.Priority is given to children of 4+.The playgroup is three days per week and a child attends two sessions.The playgroup has a leader,one assistant and two mothers (from rota) helping at each session. An elected commitee helps with fundraising and outing. Children benifit in a way that they mix with other children and paint, make models, sing, bake, use equipment supplied. The playgroups running expenses are paid from funds and the fees by parents whose children attend.
